Mark Your Calenders.

Schedule:

Lodging:

Holiday Inn of Springdale will be providing a discount for those traveling in for the weekend. Click here to take advantage of this sweet deal!

Post Party:

Please join us to continue the party after the event to build community and relationships - cause that is what cycling is about. The Springdale after party will be hosted Bike Rack Brewery on Johnson Ave in Springdale following the conclusion of the event.
